##Diary of the siege of Wuhan | Day twenty-two

Techread

Features, Lanxi, founder of zhulu.com  , focuses on in-depth observations and business reviews of Internet startups, new media, and subcultures.

Wuhan added an alarming 13,000 new infections (and 242 deaths) overnight after adding clinical judgment to the diagnostic criteria.

The explanations for both the release of stocks and the clean-up of bad debts point to a less palatable outcome, which is that almost all the predictions that have been deemed overblown so far have been woefully accurate.

Officials from Beijing who came to supervise the war said directly that up to now the infection situation in Wuhan is still unclear. "according to the calculation, the base number may still be relatively large. "

Looking back at the response to the outbreak, authorities in Wuhan and even Hubei consistently underestimated the situation, and their vigilance was constantly delayed, leading to the emergence of messengers from Khwarezm.

The system's dilemma is that none of this is due to bad faith, that everyone is punished when the epidemic worsens, and yet there are so many objective difficulties that people would rather not admit to it than protect the overall situation.

In fact, there are so many big to you to protect it, one of the small family are collapsed, the big also brittle broken so powder.

In contrast, the performance and resilience of the people is much better, active in the neighborhood neighborhood groups, self-initiated with the business, take turns to distribute daily necessities, the owners of some restaurants cooked hot meals for the hospital when the chefs were stopped at home and unable to return, and only a few left after cases of infection and death were reported in the volunteer convoy, more volunteers are asking how best to protect themselves..

Sometimes I feel that this city in mourning may not be worthy of such a strong people.

I remember that after the Wenchuan County earthquake, sociologists tracked the long-term effects of the Sichuan people, and one of the remarkable changes was in personality, such as an increased ability to withstand stress and a further consolidation of optimism, even divorce rates are up, because the more you live in the moment, the less you can tolerate being in an unhappy marriage for reasons other than your own.

I don't know what will become of Wuhan, but like lightning striking the earth, something will be changed forever after that moment.

Yes, we can finally get out of the haze, back to the summer night in the river to eat crayfish, see the colorful boats shuttle back and forth, men and women wearing flip flops, figure in the steaming temperature and light gradually melting.

Until then, everyone's job is to survive.

Nasim Taleb, author of "Black Swan, " says that instead of trying to build an indestructible system, the mind that truly guarantees effective survival must be "anti-fragile, " able to benefit from repeated setbacks, be Able to deal with uncertainty indefinitely. Long-term stability leads to the accumulation of risk until a major catastrophe occurs.

This is probably the correct explanation of how difficult it is to prosper the country.

At Youth, I hated the word, attacking its fallacious logic: If a nation can thrive only after suffering, then should it not thrive after suffering?

Now, I was a real hustler back then.

This is my diary of the siege of Wuhan, Day twenty-two.
